parameters.description: The mail sender

parameters.name: ReplyTo
parameters.description: To whom mail answers should be sent

parameters.description: The mail recepients : to,cc,bcc

parameters.name: Content
parameters.description: The mail content : subject, text and/or html. You can also use http file multipart ('subject', 'text', 'html )

parameters.name: Template
parameters.description: The referenced template

parameters.name: Campaign
parameters.description: The campaign the mail should be referenced to. Set full info about the campaign. Useful for reporting purposes (ex: search all mail relative to *last accounting period invoices*)

parameters.name: Scenario
parameters.description: The scenario the mail should be referenced to. Set full info about the scenario Useful for reporting purposes (ex: compare number of mail send for *invoices* to *credit notes*  )

parameters.name: Flow
parameters.description: The flow the mail should be referenced to. Set full info about the flowUseful for transactional purposes (ex : set flow id as invoice id and know which mail(s) is associated to which invoice)

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: Campaign and scenario are not enough to categorize your business : Use tags to label your mail (ex: statistics about *private persons* and *companies*)

parameters.name: Schedule
parameters.description: Schedule your mail in the future
